title: Weird ping issue.
body: After running a internet speed test from my house to Chicago(Which is where the servers are if I remember) I got 22ms, 60+Down Speed, and 6Upload speed, My PC is hooked to the modem with an ethernet cable and I dont lag on any other games and can stream netflix at 1080p easily. Although my ping will be 30ms for the first 5-10mins of the game after that it will spike upwards of 700 and because of that makes the game unplayable so as I try to reset my internet I disconnect and get Leaver Buster as a result.

replies.body: That sure is a nice response. It'd be a shame if someone just copy/paste it all over the boards lol :P

Even though your internet might work fine through other venues, there could still be an issue specifically reaching our servers.  It sounds like you are suffering from packet loss which could be due to a connection problem or the way your ISP is routing to reach our servers.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going on, which will include troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  I hope it helps!
